casebody.data:
Samantha LICHON, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Michael MORSE, and Michael J. Morse, P.C., Defendants-Appellants. Jordan Smits, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Michael Morse, and Michael J. Morse, P.C., Defendants-Appellants. SC: 159492
COA: 339972
SC: 159493
COA: 341082 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 14, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiffs-appellees to extend the time for filing their answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer submitted on June 13, 2019, is accepted for filing.
